channel.title: RS2008 - High Quality emulation in HD
channel.description:
[center] [b]Note to moderators: I have reviewed the rules and I think the thread is appropriate for this section and have removed some content, please correct me on anything if I did anything wrong. I'm 'Mystic Flow from other communities and I'm new here so I'm not used to the rules :p[/b]
[b]RS2008 aims to completely emulate the beginning of the high definition era.[/b]
[/center] [b]Team:[/b]
[ul][li]Steven / 'Mystic Flow[/li] [li]Steve[/li] [li]Harry[/li] [li]Maxi[/li][/ul]
[b]Content:[/b]
[ul][li]Combat[/li][/ul]
- Player vs Player - Player vs Npc - Accurate max hit formula - All specials implemented with effects - X-logging - Recoil and Vengeance - Prayer effects combat - Degradable items (Barrows, etc) - Equipment effects - Poisoning - All rangeable weapons are supported - Bonuses done correctly (ranged strength takes effect into range like it's supposed to) - Magic spells are all done
[ul][li]Woodcutting[/li][/ul]
- All axes are supported - All trees are supported - Trees decay and restore - Nests drop
[ul][li] Firemaking[/li][/ul]
- All logs are supported - Candles and lanterns can be lit up - Colored fires are supported - 100% clipped
[ul][li]Fishing[/li][/ul]
- All spots are supported - Bait and feathers are used for rod fishing - Fishing spots move
[ul][li]Thieving[/li][/ul]
- You can pickpocket from most runescape citizens - Equipment effects your chances - Stalls (Objects are removed once you steal) - Guards are able to attack if they spot you stealing
[ul][li]Mining[/li][/ul]
- All rock types are supported - Gem mining is supported - Mining spots turn into rocks once mined and are restored after time - Prospecting is supported
[ul][li]Herblore[/li][/ul]
- All herbs can be cleaned - Potions can be made with correct ingredients - You can fill vials with fountains - Potion mixes are all complete - You can combine potions
[ul][li]Fletching[/li][/ul]
- Arrow shafts and all bows can be made - You can attach feathers to shafts and arrow heads to make an arrow - You can create bolts as well - Attaching unfinished bows to string creates bow
[ul][li]Cooking[/li][/ul]
- Most fishes are cookable - All meats are cookable - Able to cook on fire - Ranges and stoves decrease chance of burning - Cooking gloves decrease chance of burning
[ul][li]Slayer[/li][/ul]
- Masters are supported - Able to talk to master through gem - Slayer store - Slayer points and the slayer points shop - Able to cancel tasks and even prevent from getting them in the future
[ul][li]Smithing[/li][/ul]
- Smelting fully supported - Forging is allowed for every item
[ul][li]Banking[/li][/ul]
- Bank tabs are fully supported - Bank pins are 100% - You can choose between insert and swap - You can note items
[ul][li]Runecrafting[/li][/ul]
- Tiara creation - Combination runes - Pouches
[ul][li]Farming[/li][/ul]
- Weed removal
[ul][li]Miscellaneous[/li][/ul]
- Cow milking
[ul][li]Pathfinding[/li][/ul]
- NPC's are clipped - Projectile clipping is added - Server sided pathfinding
[b]Media:[/b]
[center] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Al3bKBcdpoY]RS2008 Bank pins[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7yvVE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZHWTY.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sXHBl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wezqB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WAVL0.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Udei5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tHSFR.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QhrzW.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VArfp.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oJWuC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2ITMz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/d0plD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hUOIq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/p8nA7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eGras.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZRi2Y.png[/img] [/center]

item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:40, topic:465133”][quote author=Wizard jesse link=topic=569775.msg4139201#msg4139201 date=1351980153]

I made a 508 remake… o wait ur too new to know that

all your servers look terrible so it doesn’t matter and even if i am new here if your remake was at least decent i would of heard about it lol
[/quote]
Oh damn, no mercy.

@Random, are you serious? You want CM on this as well as Froyo? Oh well, I will vouch for him.

OP: I haven’t been keeping up with this and I have no clue why! It looks great so far, keep it up mane.[/quote]
I’m looking for something, gotta put the word out there. I’ll get denied more than accepted.

Read full topic
